title: What happened at Lake Oroville? | Interactive explainer
email_title: Interactive: What happened at Lake Oroville?
description: A wet winter brought to light problems at the nation’s tallest dam, leading to erosion of a hillside that prompted the evacuation of nearly 200,000 people downstream.
seo_title: What happened at Lake Oroville? | An interactive explainer
author: Emma O'Neill, John Blanchard, and Kurtis Alexander
twitter_text: What happened at Lake Oroville? How a wet winter brought to light problems at the nation’s tallest dam.
